title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 47-1.9 - Administration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 47-1.9 - Administration

State Regulations
(a) Acceptance and service agreement. Prior to being certified for payment, successful applicants must sign a written acceptance of the award and a service agreement describing the conditions of the award, the service obligation, and the terms of repayment. (b) Disbursements and collections. The Higher Education Services Corporation will be responsible for disbursements to or on behalf of the scholarship recipient. A State Health Service Corps recipient is required to comply with all administrative and reporting requirements established by the Higher Education Services Corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
47-1.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
